name: AUPrimaryCareSocialHistoryList
title: AU Primary Care Social History List
description: This profile defines a social history list structure that includes core localisation concepts for use in an Australian primary care practice-to-practice record transfer context.
purpose: This profile defines a social history list structure that includes core localisation concepts for use in an Australian primary care practice-to-practice record transfer context.

element.short: A list of social history observations in an Australian primary care practice-to-practice record transfer context.
element.definition: A list of significant health and related issues in family members.
element.comment:
Absence: A positive statement of absence of any information about family history will be represented by the phrase ‘Not available’.
Exclusion: A positive statement excluding known administration of any vaccinations will be represented by the phrase ‘Nil known’.
